charts.name: 资源加载耗时排行(CDN服务)

query.q: R::resource:(count(`*`) as `资源数`) {`provider_type` = `CDN` and `app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `resource_url_path` = '#{resource_url_path}' and `resource_url_path_group` = '#{resource_url_path_group}' and sdk_name = 'df_web_rum_sdk'} by provider_name

R::resource:(avg(`duration`) as `(AVG)加载时间`) {`provider_type` = `CDN` and `app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `resource_url_path` = '#{resource_url_path}' and `resource_url_path_group` = '#{resource_url_path_group}' and sdk_name = 'df_web_rum_sdk'} by provider_name

R::`resource`:(PERCENTILE(`duration`, 90) AS `(P90)加载时间`) { `provider_type` = 'CDN' and `app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `resource_url_path` = '#{resource_url_path}' and `resource_url_path_group` = '#{resource_url_path_group}' and sdk_name = 'df_web_rum_sdk'} BY `provider_name`
